What was your age as on first intake?
What was the duration of intake?
Have you tried to reduce or stop the consumptions of these?
How many times you tried to reduce or quit?
What was the reason for the same?

If you again started, what was the instance/reason to start again?
Did you drive vehicle after drinking or consuming substance?
Have you ever indulged into fights under influence of these addictive substances?
Have you committed any crime under the influence of drugs or due to lack of money to get it?

Were you NOT been able to sleep last night/week?
Were you NOT been able to have your meal last night/week?
Do you constantly feel depressed or in low mood since last 2 weeks?
Do you feel more irritated/anxious about minor matters than before?
Are there any distressing thoughts/images of any upsetting event?
Do you feel extremely anxious when the door of your cell is closed?
Are you having any feeling of guilt or remorse on recent event?
Do you think that other inmates in the barrack are conspiring on you?
Do you see or hear things that anyone else is not able to?

Do you think that other inmates in the barrack are conspiring on you?  Have you been bothered by recurrent and unwanted thoughts? For example – fear being unacceptable in society, thoughts of what people will think about me, fear of facing the society, thoughts of harming people responsible for your current situation even though you don’t want to harm them, fear of being judged by the society, images or impulses related to sexual obsession. Fear of getting germs due to unhealthy environment of prison. The thought about the event which led them to prison.
Suppose you see an old lady standing in a bus, she looks tired and is carrying a large bag; what will you do if you are also sitting in the bus?
option1: Leaves the seat and offer it to her
option2: Wait for someone else to offer the seat

question_name: Depressed Mood
Feeling like crying
Loss of interest in work and activities in prison
Lack of interest in talking to someone
Signs of agitation
Non willingness to talk to anyone
Retardation – Slowness of thoughts
Continuous tension and anger
Are you able to do your daily routine work efficiently? For example – taking bath, washing mouth, washing clothes and utensils, etc.
Are you able to do your prison procedures efficiently? For example –going for court dates, mulakaat, OPD proceedings, assembling for daily counting, etc.
Are you satisfied with your health?
Do you require any help for betterment of your health?
Are you satisfied with the help you get from your near and dears outside the prison? (e.g. taking care of family, court/ legal procedures, etc.)
Are you satisfied with the support/help you get from your co-inmates?
Are you able to adjust well with your co-inmates?
Are you able to cope up in spare time in the prison?
Were you satisfied with your economic status prior to prison?

How often you excessively worry about small things that you can't get rid of easily? For example - spacing issues with co inmates in barrack, issues relating to cleanliness, internal conflicts while standing in queue, etc.
Do you feel restless to the extent that it is hard to sit still while you are worried?
During these worries do you shout or snap at others even if you don't want to?
How often you feel afraid that something awful is going to happen?
How often you get annoyed during mulakaat when your friends or family complain about their problems or during court dates if the proceedings are not going according to you?
Do you sweat or feel breathless when you are in a worry?
What day is today?
What year is this?
Which season is this?
This prison is situated in which state of India?
What is barrack and ward number?
Who is the Prime Minister of India?(For foreign prisoners skip this question)
Name 5 vegetables.
Name of 5 animals.
Ask the inmate to rise their right hand then left then left and then right?
Ask the inmate to close his/her eyes and to state what is the colour of interviewer's shirt or any other easily visible articles that you suppose in close contact with inmate's eyes?
How often do you feel that somebody is in pain because off you?
How often you held yourself responsible for the present situation?
How often you feel humiliated or helpless?
How often you feel that the life is not worth living?
How often you feel that it would be better if you were dead?
How often these feelings of committing suicide come to your mind?

Have you ever experienced or witnessed or had to deal with an extremely traumatic event that included actual or threatened death or serious injury to you or someone? Did you respond with intense fear, helplessness or horror?
Do you feel anxious or uneasy in the places or situations where the escape is not possible easily or when you are alone?
Do you think that someone is controlling your thoughts and your actions or is directing you to do something?
Do you feel fearful or embarrassed being watched, being the focus of attention or fearful of being humiliated?
Do you think any intrusive or distressing thought or image is repeatedly coming to your mind or is affecting your actions and even after several efforts you are not able to stop them?
Did you repeatedly hurt animals for fun?
Did you seek pleasure in insulting your friends or family in public?
Did you feel good in destroying things at home?
Did you do things knowingly that are illegal/ punishable offenses?
Did you expose your colleagues in danger without caring?
Have you ever experienced a feeling of guilt after doing any socially unacceptable action?
What you do in your spare time in prison?
How often you participate in recreational activities inside prison?
How much you interact with your co-inmates in spare time and do you feel comfortable sharing your personal problems to them?
Do you think that the prison environment is appropriate?
Are your relations good with your family?
What improvement can you suggest in the administrative system of the jail?
Do you frequently visit to temple or enjoy doing any religious practice?
What are your views regarding the government of the nation?
What do you think about your future?
What your relatives think of you?
